data.author: Konrad Strachan

changelog.release_notes:
Added Pebble 2 support.
Improved display on monochrome screens via use of dithering.
Implemented scaling for new pop-under notifications watch OS v4.
Fixed bug relating to old activity data not being cleared properly when the day changes.

Corrected bug in configuration page where the date would be the opposite of what was selected
Updated to use latest SDK and bring in Clay via dependencies
Improved configuration page to use Clay framework.

Now respects 12/24 hour option set in watch
Added ability to configure date format and disable emoji

Added special radial drawing mode for Chalk platform
Fixed bug preventing devices without HealthAPI from ever showing the watchface (instead getting stuck on the 'please wait' screen)
Fixed bug sometimes preventing the time from being displayed when the watchface first appears until the minute changes

Now compatible with aplite platform.
Tweaked where the lines are drawn by one pixel.
Added drawing code for B&W aplite platform.

Added function to only update the 'current' data for the last hour when signaled by the API that there is an update.
Added protection from responding to events from the API too frequently, this radically reduces power consumption.
Loading of persisted data is handled better, old 'current' data from the last day is no longer loaded in when the day changes.

Added explanation of when the watchface is loading health data and the user should be patient.
Tweaks to improve CPU and battery usage.
Transition between reading health / persisted data back to watchface now faster.

Greatly improved loading time by caching health data to prevent reloading when switching to and from the watchface.
Added date.
Added emoji showing whether the wearer is doing well (relative to their average exercise for the last week) or not.

data.description:
A watch face that tells the time and integrates with Health API to show information about activity in the last 24 hours (with hour granularity) vs average data for the last week. An emoji indicates how well the wearer is doing in matching their average exercise for each point in time relative to their activity from the previous week. 

 * Supports Pebble OG and Steel (Aplite), Time and Steel (Basalt), Round (Chalk) and Pebble 2 (Diorite)
 * Shows activity for current and previous day for each hour
 * Shows historical activity for each our averaged over the last week
 * Supports 12/24 hour time display
 * Shows date in both MM-DD and DD-MM formats
 * Optimised display for round screen Pebble watches
 * Snazzy emoji that celebrates your achievements and prods you to be more active

UPDATE - 1.10 Added Pebble 2 support.
Improved display on monochrome screens via use of dithering.
Implemented scaling for new pop-under notifications watch OS v4.

UPDATE - 1.9 Fixed bug relating to old activity data not being cleared properly when the day changes.

UPDATE - 1.8 Corrected bug in configuration page where the date would be the opposite of what was selected

(change logs from earlier versions not shown due to space limitations)
